reviewText: The person that I bought this for is an aviation buff and he just loves it!  Makes a great gift for anyone interested in aviation!
I highly recommend this collection for the aviation enthsiast. If you're into aviation and history this is an excellent anthology! Hours of planes and history!
He's always been an aviation buff and is a private pilot.  Watches everything he can on flying and rates this as a great set.
Very good pictures and films on aviation for anyone interested in learning more on this subjetc. Since I have seen many other films and movies I believe that this package is OK..
Bought this as a gift for my dad who loves aviation and history. He said the DVDs are great and very informative & entertaining. Great for anyone who loves planes!
My husband is an airplane enthusiast and he thought the videos were well done. All types of airplanes are featured in this anthology.
